cards

Class AnswerCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.Card
      • cards.AnswerCard

  • public class AnswerCard
extends Card
    A type object that represents an answer card (The white cards in Cards Against Humanity).
    The classes QuestionCard and AnswerCard are different because QuestionCards allow the card to require the user to play or draw a certain number of cards.
    Since:
    CAH1.0
    Version:
    CAH1.0
    Author:
    Holt Maki
    See Also:
    QuestionCard, Card
